lines.text: I'm trying to figure out whether you're a total fucking bitch or not.
I am a total fucking bitch.
I haven't finished charming you yet.
Look, go find yourself a nice little cowgirl and make nice little cowbabies and leave me alone.
I'm hung like a horse. Think about it.
Look, I tried to be nice. I can see that's something you're not...
No, I'm trying. I can be very nice when I try. Sit down.
OK, maybe we just got off to a bad start. I know plenty of people -
I believe what we're looking for is a certain horse-like quality?
Anyone check you for a heartbeat recently?
I'm starting to feel like a...

How the fuck do you stay up here? I mean, these people... I go in the store this morning for cigarettes, they got ducks under the counter. What, do they plant these people or do they just grow out of the ground? And they look at me like, hell, I don't know.
Well, you know, they're not used to seeing guys like you around here, if you know what I mean.
Is it true what they say?
Is it true what they say about white women?
Oh, come on. I was wondering for real. Let me see it.
I'm not gonna play this game.
Is that why you carry a big gun?
The Freudian mind-fuck isn't gonna work either.
Ooh, touchy. I'm sure your woman is very understanding.
Exactly how is it that we end this phase of our relationship?
By you showing it to me. Come on, let me see it. I've never seen one before.
What makes you think I wanna see your bony ass?
You'll shut the fuck up if I show you?
I'm sure I'll be too stunned to speak.
I don't believe this. You're crazy. Shit.

I borrowed a hundred k from a man whose first and last names end in vowels, and ever week i owe him a new thousand dollars in interest and when i come up just a little short. he's got this very fun game that likes to play with thumbs. I hired a private detective for fifty percent, but now that I know where you are I am perfectly willing to spend all the money i have in hiring a clinical sociopath to take it from you, and fuck you through the eye socket JUST FOR FUN!
Designated fuck? Do they make cards for that? What if I want to be more than your designated fuck?
What? Did you leave your dick in Buffalo?
How many guys in this bar have felt her up?
Right. And how many have gone home with her, how many guys have slept with her?
Don't rest it too long, 'cause I promise you it will fall off.
Who's a girl gotta suck around here to get a drink?
Maybe it's my quaint small town morals, but I don't do murder.
As far as you're concerned any sex we had is entirely a product of your imagination.
